name: NavigationMenuLinkItem
description: Combines Item and Link into a convenient wrapper for simple navigation links. Renders an <a> element.

props.name: className
props.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Whether the link is disabled, preventing interaction and applying disabled styles.

props.name: selected
props.description: Whether the link is currently selected, applying active styles and `aria-current="page"`.

props.name: render
props.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.
